data.text: @CurtisScoon @Variety As is often the case, the oppressed hurts themselves while thinking they are helping.
@CurtisScoon @Variety In other News Tyler Perry won’t be reprising his role as Madea.

@CurtisScoon @Variety Imagine being one of the Hollywood celebs terrified to stand by your opinion and offend anyone. You have to be ok with anything and everything. They are not only actors on the screen, but in everyday life.

@techknow1776 @CurtisScoon @Variety You can pretty much ask that question about any film. We do we watch the hero get beat up over and over in a film just to win in the end? We watch actors entertain us.

@CurtisScoon @Variety This movie did not need to be a box office hit to bring awareness and even have a chance at an Oscar run. Scarlett is a name actress, doesn't matter if you like her or not, she has a name which means ATTENTION.

@CurtisScoon @Variety A perfect opportunity to bring light to Transgender and they kill it themselves. Just think what would have happened if they would have openly accepted and supported this film. More awareness and possible opportunities to appear in the film. Who knows now?
